remarks: Get an upper bound on a concretely specified finite set.  Induction step: union of two finite bounded sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
hashunlei.c $e |- C = ( A u. B ) $.
hashunlei.a $e |- ( A e. Fin /\ ( # ` A ) <_ K ) $.
hashunlei.b $e |- ( B e. Fin /\ ( # ` B ) <_ M ) $.
hashunlei.k $e |- K e. NN0 $.
hashunlei.m $e |- M e. NN0 $.
hashunlei.n $e |- ( K + M ) = N $.
hashunlei $p |- ( C e. Fin /\ ( # ` C ) <_ N ) $.
